name: ListRecurringInvoices
description:
Retrieve details of all recurring invoices.

Use this tool to get detailed information on all recurring invoices. Ideal for managing invoicing schedules and monitoring recurring payments.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization for which you want to list the recurring invoices. Required for accessing specific organization's data.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: recurrence_unique_name
parameters.description: Unique name for the recurring profile, provided by the user. Max-length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Unique name for the recurring profile given by the user. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: search_by_item_name
parameters.description: Search recurring invoices by item name, using 'item_name_startswith' or 'profileitemname_contains' variants.

value_schema.description: Search recurring invoices by item name. Variants: item_name_startswith and profileitemname_contains.

parameters.name: item_description_filter
parameters.description: Search for recurring invoices by item description using 'startswith' or 'contains' criteria.

value_schema.description: Search recurring invoices by item description. Variants: item_description_startswith and item_description_contains.

parameters.name: customer_name
parameters.description: Name of the customer for whom the recurring invoice is raised. Use this to filter invoices by customer.

value_schema.description: Name of the customer to whom the recurring invoice is raised.

parameters.name: line_item_id
parameters.description: Specify the line item ID for filtering recurring invoices.

value_schema.description: The line item id

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the item associated with the recurring invoice.

value_schema.description: Unique string generated for the item for which invoice is to be sent.

parameters.name: tax_identifier
parameters.description: ID of the tax or tax group associated with the recurring invoice.

value_schema.description: ID of the tax or tax group associated to the recurring invoice.

parameters.name: invoice_note
parameters.description: A short note for the recurring invoice, providing additional details or context.

value_schema.description: A short note for the recurring invoice.

parameters.name: recurring_invoice_start_date
parameters.description: The date on which the recurring invoice starts. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The date on which the recurring invoice starts.

parameters.name: recurring_invoice_end_date
parameters.description: The date when the recurring invoice expires, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The date on which the recurring invoice expires.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer for whom the recurring invoice is raised. Use this to filter invoices specific to a customer.

value_schema.description: Customer ID of the customer for whom the recurring invoice is raised.

parameters.name: recurring_invoice_status
parameters.description: Status of the recurring invoice: 'active', 'stopped', or 'expired'.

value_schema.description: Status of the recurring invoice. This can be active, stopped or expired.

parameters.name: filter_recurring_invoice_status
parameters.description: Filter recurring invoices by status or payment expected date. Allowed values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Stopped, Status.Expired.

value_schema.description: Filter Recurring invoices by any status or payment expected date.Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Stopped, Status.Expired

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Search invoices by invoice number, purchase order, or customer name. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search invoices by invoice number or purchase order or customer name. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: sort_by_column
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort the recurring invoices by. Leave empty for no sorting.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number to fetch, with a default value of 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to retrieve per page, with a default of 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
